//  main.cpp
//  arithmatic

//  Copyright (c) 2013 Nitish Sharma. All rights reserved.
//

#include <iostream>
#define mod 10007
using namespace std;

int primelist[10000007];
void seive()
{
    
    
    for(int i=2;i*i<=10000000;i++)
    {
        if(!primelist[i])
        {
            for(int j=i*i;j<=10000000;j+=i)
            {
                primelist[j]=1;
            }
        
        }
    
    }
    
    
    for(int i=2;i<10000007;i++)
    {
        if(primelist[i])
        {
            primelist[i]=primelist[i-1];
        
        }
        
        else
        {
            primelist[i]=primelist[i-1]+1;
        
        }
    
    }
    
    
    

}

int pow(int a,int b)
{
    int x=1,y=a;
    
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b%2==1)
        {
            x=x*y;
            
            if(x>=mod)
                x%=mod;
        
        }
        
        y*=y;
        
        if(y>=mod)
            y%=mod;
            
        b/=2;
    
    }
    
    return x;

}
int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
    seive();
    
    int  n;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        int ans;
        if(n!=1)
         ans=pow(2,primelist[n]-1);
        
        else
            ans=0;
        
        printf("%d\n",ans);
        
        
    
    }
    
    
    
    
    

   
}
